Texts.Chs: 把^orange;增强铠甲^reset;带给^red;凯文^reset;。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Booster Croptop^reset; to ^red;Kevin^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我想委婉地提醒某个又老又没吸引力的人。你能在^green;纺车^reset;上给我制作一个^orange;增强铠甲^reset;吗？我会付钱的！
Texts.Eng: I need to remind someone they aren't young and attractive anymore. Can you make me a ^orange;Booster Croptop^reset; that I can mail them? You can make one on a ^green;Sewing Wheel^reset;! I'll pay you.

Texts.Chs: 现在到第二步了！她永远不会见到它的！谢谢你的帮助。带上这个牛逼的手提箱。不过不要在这里打开它，否则所有人会^green;超级嫉妒^reset; 你并试图偷走它！相信我。
Texts.Eng: Now for phase two! She'll never see it coming! Thanks for the help. Take this awesome briefcase. Don't open it here, or everyone will get ^green;super jealous^reset; and try to steal it. Trust me.

Texts.Chs: 他们为什么这么讨厌凯文？
